oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Spencer Clack to his wife Nancy Susan Clack
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Letter to Nancy Susan Clack from her husband Spencer Clack written from Fort Rice, Dakota Territory. Transcription included. Spencer Clack was in Company B, 1st U.S. Volunteer Regiment.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Metro Archives, Nashville, Davidson County, Tennessee
